propList.Name: bordered
propList.Description: Whether to show all table borders

propList.Name: columns
propList.Description: Columns of table

propList.Name: components
propList.Description: Override default table elements

propList.Name: dataSource
propList.Description: Data record array to be displayed

propList.Name: expandable
propList.Description: Config expandable content

propList.Name: footer
propList.Description: Table footer renderer

propList.Name: getPopupContainer
propList.Description: The render container of dropdowns in table

propList.Name: loading
propList.Description: Loading status of table

propList.Name: locale
propList.Description: The i18n text including filter, sort, empty text, etc
propList.Default:
filterConfirm: Ok
filterReset: Reset
emptyText: No Data
Default

propList.Name: pagination
propList.Description: Config of pagination. You can ref table pagination config or full pagination document, hide it by setting it to false

propList.Name: rowClassName
propList.Description: Row's className

propList.Name: rowKey
propList.Description: Row's unique key, could be a string or function that returns a string

propList.Name: rowSelection
propList.Description: Row selection config

propList.Name: scroll
propList.Description: Whether the table can be scrollable, config

propList.Name: showHeader
propList.Description: Whether to show table header

propList.Name: showSorterTooltip
propList.Description: The header show next sorter direction tooltip. It will be set as the property of Tooltip if its type is object

propList.Name: size
propList.Description: Size of table

propList.Name: sortDirections
propList.Description: Supported sort way, could be ascend, descend

propList.Name: sticky
propList.Description: Set sticky header and scroll bar
propList.Type: boolean | {offsetHeader?: number, offsetScroll?: number, getContainer?: () => HTMLElement}

propList.Name: summary
propList.Description: Summary content

propList.Name: tableLayout
propList.Description: The table-layout attribute of table element
propList.Default:
-
fixed when header/columns are fixed, or using column.ellipsis

propList.Name: title
propList.Description: Table title renderer

propList.Name: onChange
propList.Description: Callback executed when pagination, filters or sorter is changed
propList.Type: function(pagination, filters, sorter, extra: { currentDataSource: [], action: paginate | sort | filter })

propList.Name: onHeaderRow
propList.Description: Set props on per header row

propList.Name: onRow
propList.Description: Set props on per row
